Scene:
The Messenger Shibukawa
(Shibukawa shisha / 渋川使者)

Play: The New Usuyuki Story (新薄雪物語)

Production: April 1998



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsukomadayū (竹本津駒大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Yasaburō (see also Nozawa Kichinosuke) (竹澤弥三郎)
